text: salamdeul-ege jaeang-i ol geunal eul gyeong-gohani joeindeul-i malhagil ju yeo eolmagan jeohuileul yuyehayeo juso seo jeohuineun dangsin-ui buleum-e bogjongha go seonjijadeul-eul ttaleugessnaida hanigalasadae neohuineun ijeon-e neohuiegejongmal-i oji anihal geos-ila maengse haji anihaessdeonyo
